history.proof: intros f a b H. unfold ex_RInt in *. destruct H as [If H]. exists If. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R If : V H : is_RInt f a b If P : V -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball (opp ?M2377) eps y -> P y" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball If eps y -> P y".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: NormedModule R_AbsRing

Goal:
forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt f b a

Premises:
ex_RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
*** [ R : Set ]
ex_RInt_point : forall (f : R -> V) (a : R), ex_RInt f a a
is_RInt_swap : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V), is_RInt f b a If -> is_RInt f a b (opp If)
bounded_continuity : forall (f : R -> ?V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x))) -> {M : R | forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) < M} where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
unifcont_normed_1d : forall (f : R -> ?V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> ball x delta y -> ball_norm (f x) eps (f y)} where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
unifcont_1d : forall (f : R -> ?V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> ball x delta y -> ~ ~ ball (f x) eps (f y)} where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- UniformSpace]
is_RInt_point : forall (f : R -> V) (a : R), is_RInt f a a zero
is_RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
Rlt_Rminus : forall a b : R, a < b -> 0 < b - a
Rabs_triang : forall a b : R, Rabs (a + b) <= Rabs a + Rabs b
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
Rlt_minus_r : forall a b c : R, a < b - c < -> a + c < b
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
SF_Chasles : forall (f : R -> ?V) (s : SF_seq) (x x0 : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)) -> Riemann_sum f s = plus (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_down' s x x0)) (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_up' s x x0)) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace R_AbsRing]
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f : R -> ?V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f (SF_cons h0 ptd) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd - fst h0) (f (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f ptd) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
filterlim_ext : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, (forall x : ?T, f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
Riemann_sum_zero : forall (f : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle ptd -> SF_h ptd = last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> Riemann_sum f ptd = zero where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
Riemann_sum_norm : forall (f : R -> ?V) (g : R -> R) (ptd : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv ptd -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd <= t <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f t) <= g t) -> norm (Riemann_sum f ptd) <= Riemann_sum g ptd where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_sum_Chasles_0 : forall (f : R -> ?V) (M x : R) (ptd : SF_seq) (eps : posreal), (forall x0 : R, SF_h ptd <= x0 <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f x0) < M) -> SF_h ptd <= x <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> pointed_subdiv ptd -> seq_step (SF_lx ptd) < eps -> norm (minus (plus (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_down ptd x)) (Riemann_sum f (SF_cut_up ptd x))) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) < 2 * eps * M where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- UniformSpace] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally_ball_norm : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball_norm y eps (f x))) where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_comp : forall (T U V : Type) (f : T -> U) (g : U -> V) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim f F G -> filterlim g G H -> filterlim (fun x : T => g (f x)) F H
continuous = fun (T U : UniformSpace) (f : T -> U) (x : T) => filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x)) : forall T U : UniformSpace, (T -> U) -> T -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _]
Riemann_sum = fun (V : ModuleSpace R_Ring) (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) => foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (f (snd y))) (SF_h ptd, zero) (SF_t ptd)) : forall V : ModuleSpace R_Ring, (R -> V) -> SF_seq -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
foldr = fun (T R : Type) (f : T -> R -> R) (z0 : R) => fix foldr (s : seq T) : R := match s with | [::] => z0 | x :: s' => f x (foldr s') end : forall T R : Type, (T -> R -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
norm_factor = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) => NormedModule.norm_factor K (NormedModuleAux.Pack K V (NormedModule.class K V) V) (NormedModule.class K V) : forall K : AbsRing, NormedModule K -> R Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted
norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) => NormedModule.norm K (NormedModuleAux.Pack K V (NormedModule.class K V) V) (NormedModule.class K V) : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), V -> R Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted
norm_compat1 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
ball_norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (x : V) (eps : R) (y : V) => norm (minus y x) < eps : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), V -> R -> V -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ R_scope _]
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N r)%Z) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a...
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
filterlim = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermap f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P s -> P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type]
SF_cons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type]
scal = fun (K : Ring) (V : ModuleSpace K) => ModuleSpace.scal K (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class K V) V) (ModuleSpace.class K V) : forall (K : Ring) (V : ModuleSpace K), K -> V -> V Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted
pairmap = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) => fix pairmap (x : T1) (s : seq T1) {struct s} : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => f x y :: pairmap y s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T1 -> T2) -> T1 -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments T1, T2 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
locally_dist_filter : forall (T : Type) (d : T -> R), Filter (locally_dist d)
locally_ex_dec : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), (forall x0 : ?T, P x0 \/ ~ P x0) -> locally x P -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> P y} where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- UniformSpace]
norm_compat2 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> seq R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R

```coq
intros f a b H. unfold ex_RInt in *. destruct H as [If H]. exists If. apply is_RInt_swap. assumption.
Qed.```
